parameters.display: Admin password for accessing Marathon HTTP service
parameters.name: marathon_password

parameters.display: Number of slave nodes in the cluster
parameters.name: slave_num

parameters.display: Number of CPUs for the slave node
parameters.name: slave_cpus

parameters.display: Amount of Memory for the slave node
parameters.name: slave_mem

parameters.display: Number of CPUs for the master node
parameters.name: master_cpus

parameters.display: Amount of Memory for the master node
parameters.name: master_mem
